Articles.Content: Testing an new Hoverport idea, not sure what the correct name would be I just gave it this name, it's a Landing Pad for Hovercrafts with Floatation. The thrust didn't bother the first pad I made but this pad is a little lighter and it was moving a little during the landing making it a little difficult. Hoverport in Transport The Parachute Transportation works great ![p>
So basically it's a landing pad for VTOLs that don't want to get their feet wet? Seems cool, although many of my VTOLs prefer water landings.

> 
> So basically it's a landing pad for VTOLs that don't want to get their feet wet? Seems cool, although many of my VTOLs prefer water landings.

The purpose for the Landing Pad was to have a place to land at the Islands near the Old Airbase Island, not only to establish a presents there but also for the challenge and thought it would look neat. I haven't given up yet, soon I made accomplish this idea.
